Trying to be positive about this set but this Batman is really disappointing. A really boring dial for a character that has limitless dial possibilities. Can't wrap my head around why WK would do Bruce so dirty like this.

March 13, 2021
Brundun94
I do like that WW TA will make him a top dial 4- 6. I feel Batman's training should make his ss roll better than average. Handing out stealth also seems good; he can screen for friendly Amazon/Allied soldier's approach. Batman's Steve Rogers-esque "I can do this all day" energy make the 8 clicks of life treatment feel appropriate, unlike Steve Trevor. Overall, it's a workable dial, good for this set, but I really feel this is a much-glorified starter set, so it's no surprise to me that designs are so simple/similar/unimpressive at first glance to seasoned players.
March 13, 2021
Mermitely
Yeah a bit of a disappointment. Especially after first seeing his sculpt. Top dial outwit would have gone a long way. We've had that since Hypertime.

Yuck. This is one of the worst Batmen ever made. He doesn’t do anything well aside from throwing smoke bombs, and his primary trait from the comics (his mind) doesn’t show up until he’s half dead. I can’t imagine any reason I’d ever play him. Sorry to all of you who play with Modern formats!
